definitions.definition: A meal , especially one offered to a guest , consisting of whatever food is available .
examples: Here are some leftover beans and meat; we can make a good potluck stew from them.

definitions.definition: Whatever is available in a particular situation .
A shared meal consisting of whatever guests have brought (sometimes without prior arrangement ); a potlatch ; also, a dish of food brought to such a meal.
The last draft or portion of an alcoholic beverage in a pot or other drinking vessel .

main_definition: ( dated ) A meal , especially one offered to a guest , consisting of whatever food is available .
secondary_definitions: ( by extension ) Whatever is available in a particular situation .
( originally Canada , US ) A shared meal consisting of whatever guests have brought (sometimes without prior arrangement ); a potlatch ; also, a dish of food brought to such a meal.
( obsolete ) The last draft or portion of an alcoholic beverage in a pot or other drinking vessel .
